name: Ouroboros (itch) (Reprobus)
description:
In an effort to convince myself that I could make even the most rudimentary game, I took on the challenge of creating a fully realized version of an arcade classic in the space of a week.

Snake was a game I always appreciated and it seemed like a not unreasonable challenge. Turned out I was right. Hooray, me!

Enjoy the following features:

  • A ridiculous difficulty curve!
  • High scores spelled as "Hi Scores"!
  • Delicious mice!
  • Programmer art!
  • 4-bar chiptunes that start out charming but quickly become grating!

A bit about the power ups:

  • Eat all the mice to finish the level.
  • Eat skulls for points.
  • Eat(?) pentagrams to slow down and chop off a chunk of your tail.

Controls, if you need them:

  • Keyboard arrows control the snake.
  • Escape pauses the game.
  • Alt+F4 force quits the game.
